#summary Instructions for installing JOverseer
#labels Featured
=Installation Instructions=

_These instructions apply to version 1.0.0 and later_

To install JOverseer:
  # Download *the libraries package* (JOverseer libraries) from the Downloads page. Unzip to your preferred folder (i.e. desktop\JOverseer)
  # Download the *JOverseer executable package* (e.g. JOverseer v1.0.x). Unzip to the folder you unzipped the libraries into (i.e. desktop\JOverseer)
  # Download and read the User Guide!

To run JOverseer, on Windows run *joverseer.bat*. On linux / unix / Mac OS, run *unix-launcher.sh*.
